price: Waɗanda suke aibanta mãsu yin alhẽri daga mummunaia cikin dũkiyõyin sadaka, da waɗanda ba su sãmu fãce iyãkar ƙõƙarinsu, sai sanã yi musu izgili. Allah Yanã yin izgili gare su. Kuma sunã da azãba mai raɗaɗi.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَلۡمِزُونَ ٱلۡمُطَّوِّعِينَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فِي ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ إِلَّا جُهۡدَهُمۡ فَيَسۡخَرُونَ مِنۡهُمۡ سَخِرَ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
